system.descriptionText: Cannot use the Floor It! Action, moving Tactical Speed requires a Full Action. (cannot move 2x Tactical Speed). Mutually Cancels out Enhanced Motive Systems Trait and becomes regular vehicle.

description.value: Cannot use the Floor It! Action, moving Tactical Speed requires a Full Action. (cannot move 2x Tactical Speed). Mutually Cancels out Enhanced Motive Systems Trait and becomes regular vehicle.
